titles.title: College Tuition Tax Relief Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/14/2009--Introduced. College Tuition Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the tax deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses.
